item.title: State Channels
item.description: State channels as a scaling solution for cryptocurrencies https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1091042382072532992 Introduction I am an assistant professor at King’s College London. There are many collaborators on this project. Also IC3. Who here has heard of state channels before? Okay, about half of the audience. Let me remove some misconceptions around them. Scalability problems in bitcoin Why are state channels necessary for cryptocurrencies? Cryptocurrencies do not scale. Bitcoin supports 10 transactions/second, ethereum is 12 transactions/second sort of depending on how big your transaction is going to be.
